We had credit card fraud during our four nights stay we reported to front desk second night when we found out that and told them the card on file has been cancelled due to fraud at that moment the front desk manager told us no need to do anything we even offered to update the card he said no need we just need to present in person when check out to pay remaining 24 dollars of parking charge
Not fancy but Hotel lobby is going thru renovations so front desk is in a tent

1: The newly remodeled room is utterly gorgeous and pristinely clean
Hi This was decent hotel rooms were clean and recently renovated very comfortable
The front desk area was nice looking and updated and they had a mini mart in the main level as well
Newly renovated rooms make this a great place to stay
The room was amazing the renos are great and every staff member we interacted with parking attendant bellman front desk housekeeping etc were gracious friendly and helpful
The location and reasonable price is what we booked for the rooms are recently remodeled and are a fair size
But the room was nice spacious and recently renovated
Super friendly staff easy parking super clean updated rooms with comfy beds
Positive staff prompt service very clean grounds updated modern rooms
